Text:
Notice: You can select a character to attack from the cards in your hand. 
You can also select multiple cards with the same <color=#F7E416>character</color> or <color=#F7E416>type</color>.
When you use the <color=#2BE41D>Soul of Skills</color>, it will give you <color=#2BE41D>skill points</color>, allowing characters to use their skills.

Since all cards in your hand are the <color=#2BE41D>Soul of Skills</color>, you can select all six. The skill button in the bottom left displays the amount of <color=#2BE41D>skill points</color> added to this attack.

Select multiple cards to use a combo. <color=#F7E416>More cards means more damage.</color>
Unleash <color=#F7E416>even more powerful attacks</color> with a combo of four or more cards.

Use the <color=#EFBE15>Soul of Secrets</color> to fill the <color=#EFBE15>Secret Skill Gauge</color> displayed under each character's HP.
When this gauge fills up, you can unleash a secret skill.
It is recommended that you utilize the skill you just acquired to increase your <color=#EFBE15>Soul of Secrets</color>.
Choose a skill that turns <color=#2BE41D>Soul of Skills</color> into <color=#EFBE15>Soul of Secrets</color>.

The <color=#EFBE15>Soul of Secrets</color> can be used to unleash a six-card combo. Each character's <color=#EFBE15>secret skill gauge</color> displays how much the gauge will be increased with the current attack.

As you have filled your <color=#EFBE15>Secret Skill Gauge</color>, <color=#F7E416>Secret Skill</color> activation is now available. Selecting this will use up the gauge and activate the Secret Skill, doing massive damage to the enemy.
You can use any card combination when activating a <color=#F7E416>Secret Skill</color>. We recommend selecting more cards before unleashing your attack.

This party has been blessed with Veldora Tempest's protection. Veldora's 
<color=#116DD5>'Divine Protection'</color> skill will increase the party's attack strength.
Using the <color=#116DD5>Soul of Divine Protection</color> will fill the <color=#116DD5>Protection Gauge</color>, allowing you to use specific skills.

The <color=#116DD5>Soul of Divine Protection</color> can be used to unleash a three-card combo. Each character's protection gauge displays how much the gauge will be increased with the current attack.
The previous turn has filled up your gauge, and now you can use a <color=#116DD5>Protection Skill</color>.

Divine Protection has converted <color=#2BE41D>Soul of Skills</color> to <color=#EFBE15>Soul of Secrets</color> and increased the strength of this skill. From now on, you will be able to use it in battle freely.

Hold your finger down on an enemy or ally to display detailed information.
It is recommended that you engage in battle based on an understanding of your enemy's information.

You can eat things during certain quests.
When you successfully eat something with <color=#F7E416>Predator</color>, you can <color=#F7E416>enhance your skills</color>.
The success rate for eating is 0% at the start of a battle. <color=#F7E416>As you land attacks, the Predator gauge will fill up, and the success rate increases</color>.

You can activate the unique skill <color=#F7E416>Predator</color> by pressing the predator button.
Your success rate depends on how full your gauge is.
Your predator gauge will go down when you get attacked by enemies.

Predator Success Rate: <color=#F7E416>High</color>
It is recommended that you activate the unique skill Predator.

The higher your Predator rating, the
more items you can acquire.
Acquired items may be used from the character details screen, and skills can also be enhanced.
Increases amount of damage according to your combo by {0}%
Increases gauge increase rate according to your combo by {0}%

Predator Success Rate: <color=#F7E416>100%+</color>
It is recommended that you activate the unique skill Predator.
